short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to capture Pixels Taskboard and easily complete tasks with the screenshot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pixels Taskboard Screenshot is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by allowing you to capture the Taskboard in Pixels game. The extension provides a seamless way to take screenshots of either a specific element or the entire visible area of your browser and then display them within the extension. 

Features

Capture Screenshots:
Element Capture: Capture a screenshot of Taskboard
Full-Screen Capture: If the Taskboard element is not found, capture a screenshot of the entire visible area of the browser.

Interactive Image Zoom:
Zoom in and out of captured screenshots by clicking on the image.
The zoom follows the cursor for precise navigation.
